Name: hypoparathyroidism
Definition: A parathyroid gland disease characterized by decreased function of parathyroid glands with underproduction of parathyroid hormone (PTH)

Name: hyperparathyroidism
Definition: A parathyroid gland disease characterized by an overactivity of the parathyroid glands

Name: parathyroid gland benign neoplasm
Definition: An endocrine organ benign neoplasm that is located_in some parathyroid gland.
